abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of the following:
            (a) the construction of new educational, boarding and/or
            staff housing facilities for about 42 general secondary
            schools, and about 9 technical schools (including the
            Mombasa Technical Institute) and about 18 primary teacher
            training colleges; and the equipping of the buildings
            referred to in paragraph (a) above with furniture,
            laboratory equipment, textbooks and other equipment.
